MS MCQs

    Product discovery in Dynamics 365 Commerce

    »

    1. Which of the following options defines product discovery in Dynamics 365 Commerce?

      The sorting of products

      A primary tool for customer interaction

      A cloud-powered search


    2. Attribute-based search enables you to do which of the following tasks?

      Set additional criteria to your search

      Separate products into categories

      Find all product attributes


    3. How does Commerce provide you with improved search performance?

      By preloading the product list

      By limiting the number of products

      By integrating with Bing
